item.title: Enjoy a complimentary stay at a luxurious hotel in Doha when you transit overnight with Qatar Airways
item.description:
Source: Qatar Airways. Doha skyline. Qatar Airways has teamed up with Qatar Tourism Authority (QTA) to launch a stopover package, aiming to highlight Qatar as a top destination for travelers. The package allows transit passengers to explore Doha with complimentary luxury hotel stays and transit visas. This unique deal is part of their larger “+Qatar” campaign, encouraging those passing through to consider extending their trip. The promotion invites all Qatar Airways transit passengers to include Doha in their travel plans by offering a free one-night stay at some of the country’s top four- and five-star hotels in the capital...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/enjoy-a-complimentary-stay-at-a-luxurious-hotel-in-doha-when-you-transit-overnight-with-qatar-airways/

item.title: Etihad Airways introduces more flights on the Abu Dhabi to Doha route
item.description:
Etihad Airways is commemorating a decade of service to Qatar this year by adding nine weekly flights to its Abu Dhabi-Doha route, strengthening its dedication to this important Gulf market. Starting August 1, 2016, the UAE’s national airline will boost its weekly service to Qatar’s capital to 37 flights. These new daily morning and early evening departures on Thursdays and Saturdays offer more flexibility and convenience, catering to business travelers in both Abu Dhabi and Doha...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/etihad-airways-introduces-more-flights-on-the-abu-dhabi-to-doha-route/

item.title: Hamad International Airport introduces two innovative dining experiences
item.description:
Source: Qatar Airways. Spizzico is one of two new dining establishments in the North Node at Hamad International Airport. Qatar Duty Free (QDF), working with global travel dining provider HMSHost International, has revealed two new dining options in the North Node of Hamad International Airport (HIA) in Doha. Burger Federation, a relaxed dining spot, has opened in the North Node of HIA’s main terminal. This restaurant presents elevated burgers made with gourmet ingredients...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hamad-international-airport-introduces-two-innovative-dining-experiences/

item.title: In 2015, Meliá Hotels opened at least 11 new locations
item.description:
Meliá Hotels International is adding at least 11 new hotels to its portfolio in 2015, including the Sol House Kuta Bali in Indonesia. Source: Meliá Hotels website. The recently opened 317-room Meliá Doha, which began welcoming guests in January, is the first Spanish hotel in Qatar. Located within Bin Samikh Tower, a prominent skyscraper in Doha’s West Bay district, the hotel enjoys a prime position on the Qatari coast. The urban German brand, Innside by Meliá, is expanding its Middle Eastern presence with the upcoming Innside Dubai, a 125-room hotel...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/in-2015-meli-hotels-opened-at-least-11-new-locations/

item.title: Flights to Doha canceled by airlines
item.description:
The diplomatic break between several countries and Qatar on June 5th has resulted in canceled flights for airlines based in the involved nations. These countries, including Bahrain, Saudi Arabia, and the UAE, have severed air, land, and sea connections with Qatar. Bahrain’s national airline, Gulf Air, halted daily flights between Bahrain and Doha as of 11:59 PM local time on June 5, 2017, until further notice. The final Gulf Air departure from Bahrain to Doha (GF530) left at 8:55 PM on June 5th, while the last flight from Doha to Bahrain (GF531) departed at 10:40 PM that same day (all times local)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/flights-to-doha-canceled-by-airlines/
